author: Just Jared
title: Skittles Super Bowl 2017 Commercial: 'Romance'
text:
Skittles Super Bowl 2017 Commercial: 'Romance' 
Skittles offers a funny take on unrequited love with their 2017 Super Bowl Commercial . 
In the 30-second spot, a teenage boy stands outside the window of his love, Katie. 
Instead of serenading her, he tosses Skittles up through her window one-by-one. 
What he doesn’t know is it’s not only Katie who’s receiving the labor of his love. 
The tag line for the commercial is “Romance the Rainbow; Taste the Rainbow.” 
Watch the Skittles commercial for the 2017 Super Bowl below! Skittles 2017 Super Bowl Commercial Just Jared on Facebook
